mapper.insert: insert into t_merchant (merchant_id, merchant_name, merchant_income, merchant_assumedate, merchant_status) values (#{merchantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{merchantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantIncome,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantAssumedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{merchantStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into t_merchant
merchant_id,
merchant_name,
merchant_income,
merchant_assumedate,
merchant_status,
#{merchantId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{merchantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{merchantIncome,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{merchantAssumedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{merchantStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update t_merchant
merchant_name = #{merchantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
merchant_income = #{merchantIncome,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
merchant_assumedate = #{merchantAssumedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
merchant_status = #{merchantStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where merchant_id = #{merchantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.delete: delete from t_merchant where merchant_id in (${id})
